getAbsoluteMousePosition

public Vector2f getAbsoluteMousePosition()
Returns:
The mouse 'correct' position (Has to do with the opengl origin being bottom left, and ours being top left).

getAbsoluteMouseX

public int getAbsoluteMouseX()
Returns:
The mouse position's 'correct' x (Has to do with the opengl origin being bottom left, and ours being top left).

getAbsoluteMouseY

public int getAbsoluteMouseY()
Returns:
The mouse position's 'correct' y (Has to do with the opengl origin being bottom left, and ours being top left).

getGlobalMousePosition

public Vector2f getGlobalMousePosition()
Returns:
The global mouse position based on the displacement of the Runner's Camera and the scaling of the graphics.

getGlobalMouseX

public float getGlobalMouseX()
Returns:
The global mouse x position based on the displacement of the Runner's Camera and the scaling of the graphics.

getGlobalMouseY

public float getGlobalMouseY()
Returns:
The global mouse y position based on the displacement of the Runner's Camera and the scaling of the graphics.

controllerButtonDown

public boolean controllerButtonDown(int button,
                                    int controller)
Returns:
Whether or not the button on controller is down; null if controllers have not been initialized.

controllerButtonUp

public boolean controllerButtonUp(int button,
                                  int controller)
Returns:
Whether or not the button on controller is up; null if controllers have not been initialized.

getLeftAnalogStick

public Vector2f getLeftAnalogStick(int controller)
Returns:
A vector containing the x and y value of the left analog stick. null if controllers have not been initialized.

getRightAnalogStick

public Vector2f getRightAnalogStick(int controller)
Returns:
A vector containing the x and y value of the right analog stick. null if controllers have not been initialized.

getDPad

public Vector2f getDPad(int controller)
Returns:
A vector containing the x and y value of the dpad. null if controllers have not been initialized.

getControllerCount

public int getControllerCount()
Returns:
The amount of controllers. -1 if controllers have not been initialized.
